# Реалізація інформаційного та програмного забезпечення

## 1. SQL-скрипт для створення на початкового наповнення бази даних:
```
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Sat May 13 12:51:03 2023
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering

SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,NO_ZERO_DATE,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema askaboutdb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS `askaboutdb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema askaboutdb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `askaboutdb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`Role`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Role` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Role` (
  `idRole` INT NOT NULL,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `description` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idRole`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`User`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`User` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`User` (
  `idUser` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `email` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `password` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `Role` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idUser`),
  INDEX `Role_idx` (`Role` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_User_Role`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Role`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`Role` (`idRole`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`State`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`State` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`State` (
  `idState` INT NOT NULL,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `description` VARCHAR(150) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idState`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`QuizType`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`QuizType` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`QuizType` (
  `idQuizType` INT NOT NULL,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idQuizType`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`Quiz`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Quiz` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Quiz` (
  `idQuiz` INT NOT NULL,
  `title` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `description` VARCHAR(150) NULL,
  `datetime` DATETIME NULL,
  `QuizType` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idQuiz`),
  INDEX `QuizType_idQuizType_idx` (`QuizType` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Quiz_QuizType`
    FOREIGN KEY (`QuizType`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`QuizType` (`idQuizType`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`Action`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Action` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Action` (
  `idAction` INT NOT NULL,
  `datetime` DATETIME NULL,
  `comment` VARCHAR(150) NULL,
  `User` INT NOT NULL,
  `State` INT NOT NULL,
  `Quiz` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idAction`),
  INDEX `User_IdUser_idx` (`User` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `State_idState_idx` (`State` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `Quiz_idQuiz_idx` (`Quiz` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Action_User`
    FOREIGN KEY (`User`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`User` (`idUser`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Action_State`
    FOREIGN KEY (`State`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`State` (`idState`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Action_Quiz`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Quiz`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`Quiz` (`idQuiz`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`StateResolve`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`StateResolve` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`StateResolve` (
  `idStateResolve` INT NOT NULL,
  `rule` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `State` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idStateResolve`),
  INDEX `State_idState_idx` (`State` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_StateResolve_State`
    FOREIGN KEY (`State`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`State` (`idState`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`QuestionType`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`QuestionType` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`QuestionType` (
  `idQuestionType` INT NOT NULL,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idQuestionType`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`Question`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Question` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Question` (
  `idQuestion` INT NOT NULL,
  `title` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `content` NVARCHAR(150) NULL,
  `Quiz` INT NOT NULL,
  `QuestionType` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idQuestion`),
  INDEX `Quiz_idQuiz_idx` (`Quiz` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `QuestionType_idx` (`QuestionType` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Question_Quiz`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Quiz`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`Quiz` (`idQuiz`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Question_QuestionType`
    FOREIGN KEY (`QuestionType`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`QuestionType` (`idQuestionType`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `askaboutdb`.`Answer`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Answer` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `askaboutdb`.`Answer` (
  `idAnswer` INT NOT NULL,
  `content` NVARCHAR(150) NULL,
  `datetime` DATETIME NULL,
  `Quiz` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idAnswer`),
  INDEX `Quiz_idQuiz_idx` (`Quiz` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `FK_Answer_Quiz`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Quiz`)
    REFERENCES `askaboutdb`.`Quiz` (`idQuiz`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Data for table `askaboutdb`.`Role`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
START TRANSACTION;
USE `askaboutdb`;
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`Role` (`idRole`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (1, 'Admin', 'Administrator role');
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`Role` (`idRole`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (2, 'Manager', 'Manager role');
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`Role` (`idRole`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (3, 'User', 'User role');
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`Role` (`idRole`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (4, 'GuestUser', 'GuestUser role');

COMMIT;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Data for table `askaboutdb`.`User`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
START TRANSACTION;
USE `askaboutdb`;
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`User` (`idUser`, `username`, `email`, `password`, `Role`) VALUES (1, 'dory', 'dominica.diem@gmail.com', 'pawwd', 1);
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`User` (`idUser`, `username`, `email`, `password`, `Role`) VALUES (2, 'imaginativefriend', 'imaginative@gmail.com', 'prool', 3);
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`User` (`idUser`, `username`, `email`, `password`, `Role`) VALUES (3, 'testsubject', 'test@gmail.com', 'test', 3);

COMMIT;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Data for table `askaboutdb`.`State`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
START TRANSACTION;
USE `askaboutdb`;
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`State` (`idState`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (1, 'Completed', 'Action is completed');
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`State` (`idState`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (2, 'Progressing', 'Action is progressing');
INSERT INTO `askaboutdb`.`State` (`idState`, `name`, `description`) VALUES (3, 'Canceled', 'Action is canceled');

COMMIT;

```

## 2. RESTfull сервіс для управління даними
```
import fastapi
from fastapi import FastAPI, Request
from fastapi.responses import JSONResponse
import pymysql

app = FastAPI()


class DataBase(object):

    def __new__(cls):
        if not hasattr(cls, 'instance'):
            cls.instance = super(DataBase, cls).__new__(cls)
        return cls.instance

    def __init__(self):
        self.connection = None
        self.cursor = None
        self.__connect()

    def __connect(self):
        self.connection = pymysql.connect(
            host='localhost',
            user='root',
            password='st0Ne_0c3aN',
            database='askaboutdb',
        )
        self.cursor = self.connection.cursor(pymysql.cursors.DictCursor)

    def execute(self, command):
        self.cursor.execute(command)
        result = self.cursor.fetchall()
        self.connection.commit()
        return result


@app.get("/api/allusers")
async def get_users():
    db = DataBase()
    return JSONResponse(db.execute('SELECT * FROM user'))


@app.get('/api/user/{id}')
def get_user_by_id(id):
    db = DataBase()
    result = db.execute(f'SELECT * FROM user WHERE idUser={id}')
    if not result:
        raise fastapi.HTTPException(status_code=404)
    return JSONResponse(result)


@app.post('/api/adduser', status_code=201)
async def add_new_user(req: Request):
    req_dict = await req.json()
    try:
        username = req_dict['username']
        email = req_dict['email']
        password = req_dict['password']
        id_role = req_dict['Role']
    except:
        raise fastapi.HTTPException(status_code=400)
    db = DataBase()
    db.execute(f"INSERT INTO `user`(`username`, `email`, `password`, `Role`) VALUES ('{username}','{email}','{password}',{id_role});")
    return {'message': 'New user added!'}


@app.put('/api/updateuser/{id}')
async def update_user(id, req: Request):
    req_dict = await req.json()
    db = DataBase()
    for key in req_dict:
         if not db.execute(f'SELECT * FROM user WHERE idUser={id}'):
            raise fastapi.HTTPException(status_code=404)
         db.execute(f'UPDATE user SET {key}="{req_dict[key]}" WHERE idUser={id}')
    return {"message": 'Updated!'}


@app.delete('/api/deleteuser/{id}')
def delete(id):
    db = DataBase()
    if not db.execute(f'SELECT * FROM user WHERE idUser={id}'):
        raise fastapi.HTTPException(status_code=404)
    db.execute(f'DELETE FROM `user` WHERE idUser={id}')
    return {'message': f'User with id={id} deleted'}
```
